typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Region as string,
		Country as string,
		{Item Type} as string,
		{Sales Channel} as string,
		{Order Priority} as string,
		{Order Date} as date,
		{Order ID} as integer,
		{Ship Date} as date,
		{Units Sold} as short,
		{Unit Price} as double,
		{Unit Cost} as double,
		{Total Revenue} as double,
		{Total Cost} as double,
		{Total Profit} as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> SalesData
SalesData pivot(groupBy({Item Type}),
	pivotBy({Sales Channel}),
	{} = sum({Total Revenue}),
	columnNaming: '$N$V',
	lateral: true) ~> SalesPivot
SalesPivot sink(input(
		Gender as string,
		{Total Children} as string,
		{Total Income} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['PivotedSalesDataOP.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> PivotedSalesData
